To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AdvanceDeclineVolumeRatio _advr;

// In Initialize()
var symbols = new[] {AddEquity("SPY").Symbol, AddEquity("QQQ").Symbol};
_advr = ADVR(symbols);

// In OnData()
if (_advr.IsReady)
{
    var current = _advr.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbols = [self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol, self.AddEquity("QQQ").Symbol]
self.advr = self.ADVR(symbols)

# In OnData()
if self.advr.IsReady:
    current = self.advr.Current.Value
